insert into assiste_org ( id, code, name, asc_code, asc_name, org_id, org_code, org_name, sup_code, sup_name, sync_system, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, operator, operator_name, gmt_modify) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.ascCode}, #{item.ascName}, #{item.orgId}, #{item.orgCode}, #{item.orgName}, #{item.supCode}, #{item.supName}, #{item.syncSystem}, #{item.creator}, #{item.creatorName}, #{item.gmtCreate}, #{item.operator}, #{item.operatorName}, #{item.gmtModify})
on duplicate key update name = values(name), asc_code = values(asc_code), asc_name = values(asc_name), org_id = values(org_id), org_code = values(org_code), org_name = values(org_name), sup_code = values(sup_code), sup_name = values(sup_name), sync_system = values(sync_system), operator = values(operator), operator_name = values(operator_name), gmt_modify = values(gmt_modify)
